name: Colgate Max Fresh Blue Gel Toothpaste
description:
Colgate Max Fresh Blue Gel toothpaste contains unique cooling crystals that give you intense cooling while you brush. Recommended Usage: Put a pea-sized amount of our Colgate toothpaste on the head of the toothbrush. Insert the toothbrush into your mouth & use gentle, short strokes to brush your teeth.
Colgate Max Fresh Blue Gel toothpaste contains unique cooling crystals that give you intense cooling while you brush. Recommended Usage: Put a pea-sized amount of our Colgate toothpaste on the head of the toothbrush. Insert the toothbrush into your mouth & use gentle, short strokes to brush your teeth.

name: Colgate Anticavity Active Salt Toothpaste
description:
Colgate Anticavity Active Salt Toothpaste is an advanced oral care solution that combines the power of active salt with natural calcium to strengthen teeth and prevent cavities. Its refreshing formula not only cleans your teeth effectively but also ensures long-lasting fresh breath, making it an essential part of your daily oral hygiene routine. Benefits:Cavity Protection: Prevents cavities by strengthening enamel with added calcium.Plaque Removal: Active salt helps remove stubborn plaque and impurities.Gum Health: Promotes healthy gums by combating germs and bacteria.Fresh Breath: Leaves your mouth feeling fresh with a long-lasting clean sensation.Gentle Formula: Safe for daily use by the entire family. Ingredients:Active Salt: Natural antibacterial properties for fighting germs.Calcium: Strengthens enamel and prevents decay.Fluoride: Protects against cavities and strengthens teeth.Mint Extracts: Provides a refreshing and clean taste. Uses:Brush teeth thoroughly twice a day for optimal oral hygiene.Suitable for both adults and children above six years of age. Weight : 200 gm
Colgate Anticavity Active Salt Toothpaste is an advanced oral care solution that combines the power of active salt with natural calcium to strengthen teeth and prevent cavities. Its refreshing formula not only cleans your teeth effectively but also ensures long-lasting fresh breath, making it an essential part of your daily oral hygiene routine.

Brush teeth thoroughly twice a day for optimal oral hygiene.
Suitable for both adults and children above six years of age.
 
Weight : 200 gm

name: Pepsodent Toothpaste Sensitive Expert Professional
description:
Sensitive Expert by Pepsodent relieves pain from sensitivity in only 30 seconds and stops it from coming back. With its unique HAP formulation, Sensitive Expert helps fasten the remineralisation process on enamel decayed areas to stop the sensitivity from coming back.
Sensitive Expert by Pepsodent relieves pain from sensitivity in only 30 seconds and stops it from coming back. With its unique HAP formulation, Sensitive Expert helps fasten the remineralisation process on enamel decayed areas to stop the sensitivity from coming back.

name: Closeup Toothpaste Menthol Fresh
description:
Do you brush your teeth hurriedly? Do you often forget to use mouthwash or not use it altogether? Are your teeth dull and covered with a yellowish coating of plaque? If your answer to the above questions is yes then Closeup Menthol Fresh Toothpaste is the toothpaste for you. Its unique Active Zinc Mouthwash not only cleans deep corners of your mouth of residual germs it also gives you upto 12 Hours Fresh Breath. It helps your teeth stay strong and healthy thanks to the fluoride in it and its microshine crystals help reduce the yellowing of your teeth. * Upto 12 hours of lasting fresh breath is based on In-vivo study with regular use over 4 weeks. Kill the bacteria that cause bad breath with Closeup menthol Fresh Toothpaste.Bad breath can be caused by the millions of bacteria that live in your mouth. If you don't brush and floss every day, plaque germs can form. Closeup gel toothpaste helps kill the bacteria and helps prevents bad breath. *Dental plaque germs    Brushing with Closeup gel toothpaste is one simple step you can incorporate into your daily routine to help keep your mouth healthy, and it can have a positive effect on your oral health. FDI – World Dental Federation recognizes that brushing twice daily with Closeup Menthol Fresh Toothpaste is beneficial to oral health.

name: Colgate Max Fresh Red Gel Toothpaste
description:
Colgate Max Fresh Red gel toothpaste contains unique cooling crystals that dissolve completely as you brush. Colgate Max fresh toothpaste contains menthol that gives intense cooling and super freshness. It fights cavities, keeps germ build-up at bay, and makes your teeth whiter on continuous use.
Colgate Max Fresh Red gel toothpaste contains unique cooling crystals that dissolve completely as you brush. Colgate Max fresh toothpaste contains menthol that gives intense cooling and super freshness. It fights cavities, keeps germ build-up at bay, and makes your teeth whiter on continuous use.

name: Pepsodent Toothpaste Sensitive Expert Gum Care (Free Toothbrush)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India. Pepsodent Toothpaste Sensitive Expert Gum Care 140g is an excellent choice for those with sensitive teeth. This toothpaste is specially formulated to provide expert gum care while being gentle on your teeth.

name: Medident-G Gum Care 140 gm & Sensitive Care Toothpaste 40 gm (Combo)
description:
Medident-G Gum Care Toothpaste 140 gm & Medident Sensitive Care Toothpaste 40 gm (Combo) Medident toothpaste unique HAP formulation. Helps fasten the remineralization process on enamel decayed areas & improves Gum health, and helps fight tartar buildup. Twice daily brushing builds soothing protection inside the tooth. Additionally, Medident toothpaste Tartar Fighting leaves a fresh, clean feeling in your mouth. Brand: MEDIDENT Effectiveness: Cavity protection.Fresh taste.Fights tartar build-up.WhiteningContains Fluoride ion 1000 ppmBest oral hygiene solutionPack Size 140g How to use:For best results, use sensitive toothpaste twice daily with a soft-bristled toothbrush. Use gentle, circular brushing motions to cover all areas of your teeth, including the gum line.
Medident-G Gum Care Toothpaste 140 gm & Medident Sensitive Care Toothpaste 40 gm (Combo)

name: Colgate Strong Teeth Toothpaste
description:
Natural calcium gets depleted while eating. Colgate Strong Teeth has a unique Calcium Boost formula which restores Calcium levels, making your teeth 2x stronger. Colgate Strong Teeth toothpaste helps prevent cavities, whitens teeth, and freshens breath with regular use.

name: Aquafresh Toothpaste Active Fresh
description:
Aquafresh Active Fresh is a fluoride-based toothpaste that provides long-lasting fresh breath, cavity protection, and gum health. Its advanced formula helps remove plaque and bacteria while strengthening enamel to prevent tooth decay. The intense menthol flavor delivers a cooling sensation, keeping your mouth feeling fresh throughout the day. Suitable for daily use, it ensures complete oral care for strong teeth and healthy gums.

name: Aquafresh Toothpaste Triple Protection
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in United Kingdom and its raw materials are collected from United Kingdom. Aquafresh Triple Protection Toothpaste (100 ml) provides cavity protection, healthy gums, and fresh breath in one formula. It contains fluoride to strengthen enamel and prevent decay while removing plaque for better gum health. The signature triple-striped design delivers a refreshing minty flavor for long-lasting freshness. Suitable for daily use, it ensures complete oral hygiene for the whole family.

name: WhitePlus Toothpaste
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India. How does White Plus provide the most effective dental protection? The toothpaste is enriched with Calci Strong, which ensures stronger teeth. The combination of cavity guard, power cleanser and plaque blaster provides the most intense dental care. Calcium is an essential mineral for dental safeguard. Calci Strong of White Plus provides daily enamel protection. Tooth enamel protects teeth from decay. If your teeth are not healthy, even bite on a delicious food can become painful. Without healthy and strong teeth, all the yummy and spicy dishes taste like sour grapes! And White Plus is just there to confirm healthy teeth and gum. Regular use of Daily Enamel Repair based White Plus Toothpaste will ensure decay repairing, strengthening gum & Teeth and assure fresh breath.Ingredients: Calcium carbonate, Silica, Sodium Carboxymethyl cellulose, Sodium saccharin, Sodium Monofluorophosphate, Sodium lauryl sulfate, Glycerine, Sorbitol, Aqua, PEG, Triclosan, Benzyl Alcohol, Frescolat, Peppermint and Spearmint oil, Clove Bud Oil
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India.

name: Colgate Visible White Toothpaste
description:
Colgate Visible White Toothpaste is a unique teeth whitening toothpaste which gives you one shade whiter teeth in one week. It is Infused with whitening accelerators that gently exfoliates stains and polishes teeth surface while protecting the enamel to help you create a lasting impression with whiter teeth and smile.

description:

name: Closeup Toothpaste Red Hot
description:
Its unique Active Zinc Mouthwash not only cleans deep corners of your mouth of residual germs it also gives you up to 12 Hours of Fresh Breath. It helps your teeth stay strong and healthy thanks to the fluoride in it and its microshine crystals help reduce the yellowing of your teeth. * Up to 12 hours of lasting fresh breath is based on an in-vivo study with regular use for over 4 weeks.  Kill the bacteria that cause bad breath with Closeup Red Hot Toothpaste. Bad breath can be caused by the millions of bacteria that live in your mouth. If you don't brush and floss every day, plaque germs can form. Closeup gel toothpaste helps kill the bacteria and helps prevent bad breath. *Dental plaque germs Brushing with Closeup gel toothpaste is one simple step you can incorporate into your daily routine to help keep your mouth healthy, and it can have a positive effect on your oral health. name: Sensodyne Fresh Mint Toothpaste
description:
Sensodyne® is the popular selling toothpaste for sensitive teeth. Using Sensodyne® twice daily provides 24/7 protection against tooth sensitivity.  Sensodyne® Fresh Mint provides a refreshing mint flavor, fights tooth decay and keeps gums healthy.

name: Dabur Meswak Toothpaste (Free Toothbrush)
description:
Meswak is made from a rare herb, which grows slowly, resisting the brutal forces of nature amidst the dunes of Africa and South Asia. Even a small portion of this herb is capable of providing Complete Oral Care. Dabur brings to you, this herb in the form of Incredible “Meswak” Toothpaste. It is scientifically proven to help reduce tartar and plaque, fight germs and bacteria to keep gums healthy, help prevent tooth decay, eliminate bad breath, and ensure strong teeth, all at once to provide Complete Oral Care. Ingredients:Calcium Carbonate, Sorbitol, Water, Silica, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Flavor, Meswak Extract, Cellulose Gum, Carrageenan, Sodium Silicate, PVM/MA Copolymer, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Benzoate, CI 77891, Triclosan

name: Mediplus DS Toothpaste
description:
Sodium phosphate acts as an effective cleansing agent, helping clean food and bacteria off the surface of teeth. It also provides a buffering system for the overall toothpaste product, helping maintain an appropriate PH.

name: Mediplus Fluoride Gel Toothpaste
description:
Its clinically proven sensitivity relief agent effectively soothes tooth nerve ends, whilst the gentle whitening system lifts away surface stains and contains tartar-fighting ingredients for shiny white teeth. Mediplus DS toothpaste also helps protect against acid erosion remineralizing the enamel and hardening the tooth surface.

name: Sensodyne Deep Clean Toothpaste
description:
Introducing Sensodyne Deep Clean Toothpaste in a 70 gm tube, a specialized oral care solution designed to provide relief from tooth sensitivity while delivering a thorough and refreshing cleaning experience.This toothpaste is formulated to address sensitivity and maintain oral health, ensuring a gentle and effective cleaning routine. name: Colgate Total Advance Health Toothpaste
description:
Colgate Total Advanced Health Toothpaste 120 gm Product Type: Toothpaste Brand: Colgate  Calcium and minerals formula seeks and repairs early signs of cavities  Only 20% of the germs in your mouth are on your teeth, the rest 80% are on gums, tongue and cheeks. Colgate Total Advanced Health is an antibacterial toothpaste that fights germs on teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums, giving you Whole Mouth Health for 12 hours.This toothpaste has superior technology and actively seeks out bacteria on your teeth, tongue, cheeks and gums, forming a protective, anti-germ barrier - unlike an ordinary toothpaste.Colgate Total provides more benefits than before - helping prevent cavities, plaque build-up, tartar formation, gingivitis and sensitivity. It gives you fresh beathe , protects your enamel, and removes stains, giving you a healthier, whiter smile.Recommended usage: Brush twice a day for 2 minutes each time. Children below 6 years of age should have adult supervision.Good oral care habits keep your teeth and gums healthy, prevents tooth decay, gum disease & bad breath. To maintain good oral hygiene brush twice a day for 2 minutes each time, rinse with mouthwash for 30 seconds, and replace your toothbrush every 3 months.Colgate is India's most trusted oral care brand and certified by Indian Dental Association. This toothpaste is Vegan, Sugar-free and Gluten free.

name: Pepsodent Toothpaste Germi Check +
description:
For strong, white teeth, get the Germi Check Toothpaste from Pepsodent. The superior germ attack power helps fight cavity-causing germs even hours after Brushing and the advanced formula gives you a complete oral care solution. Formulated with fluoride and triclosan, this toothpaste ensures a long-lasting fresh breath. It reduces stains and food remains, giving you plaque-free and germ-free teeth. Along with maintaining your teeth's health, this toothpaste prevents your gums from damage too—the perfect oral care solution for your family.

name: Colgate Kids Premium Toothpaste (0-2 Years)
description:
It is specially developed toothpaste for kids with 0% artificial flavours, preservatives, sweeteners and colours. It is fluoride free toothpaste and contains natural fruit flavour for babies up to 2 years of age. This toothpaste gently cleans and protects your baby's tiny teeth and gums.
